page.title: 08The Police and the Village
page.content: This page is based on an interview with one of the local policemen. The police force is made up of men and women who help to keep peace in our country.They are employed by the Council.The police patrol the village by foot and by car to talk to local people and to help newcomers to the village. 'O' level exam passes are needed to enter the police force so a policeman has to be quite clever.Every policeman has his own identification number,the uniform is blue and it has to be worn on duty. The police are only allowed to use a weapon if vitally necessary. Two policemen based in the neighbouring village Long Buckby act as community policemen. The police take a cycling proficiency course at the school each summer.
